title: How to Make Kaada

steps.headline: Make a powder of black pepper and jaggery.
Slice the piece of ginger into many small pieces.
steps.description: Add the small slices of ginger into the powdered jaggery and black pepper.

steps.headline: Open the cardamoms from the side and add it into the mixture of black pepper, ginger and jaggery.
Add one-fourth inch of cinnamon stick, 2-3 cloves and one teaspoon fennel seeds into it.
Add the mixture of jaggery, black pepper, cinnamon stick, cloves, fennel seeds, cardamom and ginger into 3-4 cups of hot water.
Pour the mixture through a sieve.
Keep the liquid and discard the rest.
steps.description: Add one teaspoon of coffee powder, stir well, and serve!

text: Make a powder of black pepper and jaggery.  Slice the piece of ginger into many small pieces. Add the small slices of ginger into the powdered jaggery and black pepper. Open the cardamoms from the side and add it into the mixture of black pepper, ginger and jaggery.  Add one-fourth inch of cinnamon stick, 2-3 cloves and one teaspoon fennel seeds into it.  Add the mixture of jaggery, black pepper, cinnamon stick, cloves, fennel seeds, cardamom and ginger into 3-4 cups of hot water.  Pour the mixture through a sieve.  Keep the liquid and discard the rest. Add one teaspoon of coffee powder, stir well, and serve!
